extendedInfo.description: Love Lipstick? Then you will love this lipstick makeup and cosmetics app! "Have you ever wanted to have an app that gave you the ideas, techniques and hottest lipstick looks at your finger tips?"Well now you can with Lipstick Guru but not only that, this app will let you take pictures of your best lipsticks, shades and styles, using the inbuilt camera on your phone and let you share them with lipstick lovers around the world and give you inspiration for new looks!Being lipstick, cosmetics and makeup fanatics we love the effects of lipstick and the dramatic difference it can make to a persons looks and self-esteem! (i.e. red lipstick or nude lipstick effects). This app was built to give you the latest and Hottest lipstick looks and techniques, so when you have got a new outfit or want a new look this makeup app with give you the inspiration, the tips and tricks to help you pull it off and tips on how to apply lipstick.Want to know how to apply red lipstick correctly? glitter lips effects? how to pull off nude lipstick or just want to get ideas on different lipstick looks - this beauty app is FOR YOU!We know there is such a huge group of lipstick and cosmetic enthusiasts out there! So that is why you can take a picture of your best lipstick look, upload it for everybody to see and admire and get new ideas for yourself and join the hottest lipstick cosmetics community.Grab your Lipstick Guru App TODAY!
